We refer to Wikipedia articles on physics for help. The statement occurs between 00:02:23 and 00:02:41.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

The correct answer is B: [00:04:47 - 00:05:19]. 

In this segment of the video, the presenter is explaining how they will be looking at the forces acting on an object in equilibrium. They mention that the object in question is going to be a garbage gobler truck on an inclined plane. The plane is inclined at an angle of 30 degrees with the horizontal. There is also a bumper back here which keeps the truck from falling backwards. 

The presenter then goes on to discuss how they are going to replace the bumper and normal forces with tensions by threading two strings over pulleys. One string is nearly parallel to the plane, which will replace the bumper force, and the other is perpendicular to the plane, which will replace the normal force. This setup allows them to study the forces in more detail.
